devdoc.author: Basil Gorin
devdoc.details: BalanceProxy provides a convenient way of queering several   uint256 balances of any address(es) against some other smart contract   address(es) implementing BalanceOf interface

balancesOf(address[],address).details: Gets an array of balances of the owner specified     against `BalanceOf` instances specifiedRequires array of instances not to be empty and contain     valid addresses of the `BalanceOf` instances

params.owner: an address to query balances for

devdoc.title: Balance Proxy
